0001_0001.instruction: Generate multiple images depicting a stylish scene of a barber with clippers. The images should showcase activities such as cutting hair in a barbershop, trimming a beard with scissors, and cleaning up the work area. The setting should reflect a lively and professional barbershop environment.
sub_caption: A stylish barbershop interior with warm lighting and vintage decor. A skilled barber wearing a crisp apron stands behind a leather chair, using electric clippers to give a client a fresh haircut. Mirrors reflect the bustling atmosphere, with other customers waiting their turn.

Close-up view of a bearded man receiving a trim. The barber, dressed in a trendy outfit, carefully uses scissors to shape the beard. The client is seated in a classic barber chair, with grooming products and tools visible on a nearby counter.

A barber cleaning up their workstation after a busy day. The scene shows swept hair on the floor, sanitized tools being organized, and fresh towels being folded. The barbershop's retro-modern aesthetic is evident in the background, with leather chairs and wood accents visible.

0001_0001.Common_Instructions: All images share a modern, lively barbershop setting with retro-inspired decor, neon accents, and checkered flooring. The barber wears a crisp black apron and has a confident demeanor, maintaining consistency in appearance and environment across scenes.
Set_Sub_Structure: A barber skillfully using electric clippers to shape a client's fade haircut. The client sits in a vintage leather chair facing a large mirror reflecting hanging pendant lights. Hair strands float mid-air, captured in dynamic motion with precise tool handling.

The barber carefully trims a beard using silver scissors, leaning close to the client's face with focused precision. A neatly organized tool tray holds combs and oils, while a neon 'OPEN' sign glows warmly in the background window.

The barber sweeps hair clippings into a dustpan near a polished workstation. Clean towels hang neatly on racks as sunlight streams through half-drawn blinds, highlighting gleaming tools arranged on a marble countertop.

0001_0002.instruction: Generate multiple images portraying a medical scene of a dentist in scrubs. The images should include activities such as explaining oral hygiene to a patient, taking X-rays of teeth, cleaning teeth in a dental office, and filling a cavity during an appointment. The setting should depict a realistic dental clinic.
sub_caption: A dentist in blue scrubs standing next to a seated patient in a dental chair. The dentist is holding a model of teeth and gesturing while explaining proper oral hygiene techniques. The patient listens attentively. A bright dental light illuminates the scene in a clean, modern dental office with posters about dental health on the walls.

A dental technician in scrubs positioning a patient for an X-ray in a separate room of the dental clinic. The patient wears a lead apron and bites down on a small device. The X-ray machine is visible, and the technician stands behind a protective screen, ready to take the image. The room has a slightly dimmer lighting with specialized equipment visible.

A dental hygienist in scrubs performing a teeth cleaning on a reclined patient in a dental chair. The hygienist uses a scaling tool while wearing protective eyewear and a mask. A dental assistant stands nearby, ready to assist. Sunlight filters through blinds, illuminating the modern dental equipment and creating a calm atmosphere in the treatment room.

A dentist in scrubs filling a cavity for a patient. The dentist is focused, using a dental drill while the patient's mouth is held open with a dental prop. A dental assistant helps by holding a suction tool. The scene shows the dentist's skilled hands at work, with various dental instruments neatly arranged on a nearby tray. The room has a professional, sterile appearance with state-of-the-art dental technology visible.

The dentist adjusts an X-ray machine near a patient wearing a protective apron. The image emphasizes the clinic's imaging equipment, focused expressions, and the sterile arrangement of bitewing tabs on a tray.

The dentist leans over a reclined patient, using a mirror and polisher during a teeth cleaning. The scene highlights the dental chair's adjustable headrest, overhead light positioning, and organized instruments on a rolling tray.

The dentist wears magnifying loupes while preparing to fill a cavity, holding a dental drill above a patient’s open mouth. Cabinets with labeled supplies and a suction tool nearby reinforce the procedural precision of the setting.

Their massive bodies are arranged in various relaxed poses, some with flippers draped over each other. The walrus sprawls lazily on a floating ice floe, tusks resting against the ice. Cracks and blue hues in the ice contrast with its creamy-white fur. Distant snow-capped mountains and a pale sky frame the scene, emphasizing isolation and tranquility.

sub_caption: A sleek cheetah sprinting across the savannah at top speed. Its muscular body is stretched out, paws barely touching the ground. Sharp, focused eyes are fixed ahead. The golden grass blurs in the background, emphasizing the cheetah's incredible velocity.

A cheetah stalking a gazelle in tall grass. Its body is low to the ground, ears perked forward. The cheetah's sharp eyes are intently focused on the unsuspecting gazelle in the distance. Dappled sunlight filters through the grass, creating a camouflage effect.

A cheetah relaxing in the shade under an acacia tree. Its lean body is sprawled out, tail lazily flicking. The cheetah's sharp eyes are half-closed in contentment. The tree's branches cast intricate shadows across its spotted coat.

A cheetah marking its territory by rubbing its scent on a tree trunk. Its tail is raised, body arched as it rubs against the bark. The cheetah's sharp eyes scan the surroundings, alert for any potential threats or competitors.

A cheetah napping after a successful hunt. It's curled up on a small mound, belly full and satisfied. Its sharp eyes are closed in peaceful slumber. Nearby, the remains of its prey can be seen, with a few scavenging birds circling overhead.

0002_0001.instruction: Please generate a knight character in a realistic style, showing only the head or upper body. He is wearing silver armor, with a determined face and short hair. sub_caption: A realistic portrait of a knight, showing his head and upper body. He wears gleaming silver armor and has short hair. His face is determined and confident, with a warm smile. His eyes sparkle with self-assurance, and his posture exudes strength and nobility.

A close-up of the knight's head and upper body, still clad in silver armor. His face is lit up with joyous laughter, eyes crinkled at the corners and gleaming with the thrill of victory. His mouth is wide open in a hearty laugh, showing genuine happiness and relief.

The knight's head and upper body portrait, wearing the same silver armor. His expression shows extreme fatigue and pain. His brows are deeply furrowed, eyes half-closed and shadowed. There are lines of exhaustion around his mouth, and his overall demeanor suggests he's been through a grueling ordeal.

A close-up of the knight's head and upper torso in silver armor. His face is contorted with anger, teeth clenched tightly. His eyes are sharp and fierce, blazing with fury. The muscles in his jaw and neck are visibly tense, conveying intense rage and determination.

The knight's face is tense, brows deeply furrowed into a stern frown. His lips press into a thin line, and his jaw is rigid. The armor shows subtle texture details under dramatic lighting, enhancing the serious atmosphere.

The knight laughs heartily, eyes crinkled with joy and teeth visible. His head tilts back slightly, conveying unrestrained triumph. The armor catches brighter highlights to mirror the energetic mood, hair slightly tousled from movement.

Fatigue weighs on the knight's face: brows knit in pain, eyes half-closed, and lips parted in a weary exhale. The armor appears duller, with faint shadows under his eyes adding to the exhausted portrayal.

sub_caption: A female astronaut in a sleek white spacesuit high-fiving another astronaut through their helmet visors. Their gloved hands meet in the center, with a faint reflection of the space station interior visible on the curved helmet surfaces. Floating tools and equipment can be seen in the background, emphasizing the zero-gravity environment.

The astronaut's eyes are wide with excitement, and small bubbles of water are suspended in the air around them. The scene is lit with a soft blue glow from nearby control panels.

An astronaut in a form-fitting spacesuit examining holographic displays projected from their wrist-mounted device. Through a large curved window behind them, the blue marble of Earth is clearly visible, partially obscured by wispy clouds. The interior of the space station is visible, with futuristic equipment and blinking lights.

Two astronauts laughing heartily as they try to catch floating space snacks with their mouths. Colorful, bite-sized cubes and spheres hover in the air between them. 0003_0006.instruction: Five rainy day dog walker shots? 1) Laughing under polka dot umbrella. 2) Wiping muddy paws at park entrance. 3) Carrying tiny dachshund over puddle. 4) Coffee cup steaming on bench with leash. 5) Golden retriever shaking off spray. Keep it playful and soggy!
sub_caption: A cheerful dog walker laughing under a large polka dot umbrella. Rain is falling heavily around them, creating a lively atmosphere. Their dog, possibly a medium-sized breed, is peeking out from under the umbrella, looking curious and slightly wet.

At the entrance of a park, a dog walker is crouched down, wiping the muddy paws of their dog with a towel. The ground is wet and puddles are visible. The dog, patient but eager to play, has its tail wagging despite the rain.

A dog walker carefully carries a tiny dachshund over a large puddle. The puddle reflects the gray sky and surrounding trees. The dachshund looks content in its owner's arms, staying dry while other pedestrians splash by in the background.

A steaming coffee cup sits on a wet park bench, with a leash draped beside it. In the background, a blurred figure of the dog walker can be seen playing fetch with their dog in the rain, creating a cozy yet active rainy day scene.

A golden retriever, soaking wet, is captured mid-shake near its owner. Water droplets fly in all directions, creating a spray effect. The dog walker is attempting to shield themselves, laughing as they get splashed. The background shows a rainy park setting.

The dog walker lifts a dachshund above a wide rainwater puddle, their raincoat hood blown back by wind. The dog’s ears flutter mid-air as rain ripples the puddle surface below. A crumpled paper coffee cup floats nearby.

A steaming latte rests on a wet park bench beside a loosely draped leash. The dog walker adjusts their yellow raincoat hood nearby while a patient corgi sits attentively, raindrops creating circular patterns in a puddle by the bench legs.

A golden retriever mid-shake sprays water droplets in dynamic arcs. The dog walker leans back laughing, one arm raised to shield their face. Raindrops collide with airborne water spray, creating a chaotic yet joyful texture.

Shelves lined with mystical objects and potion ingredients frame the image.

The silver-haired witch hunched over an ancient, leather-bound tome in her apothecary. She reads by candlelight, with several melting candles casting a warm, flickering glow across the pages. Her finger traces lines of arcane text as she studies intently. Surrounding her are stacks of old books, scrolls, and magical artifacts. Glittering sparkles float in the air, emphasizing the mystical ambiance. Shadows dance on the walls, hinting at the secrets contained within the book.

The armor's chest plate, gauntlets, and leg guards are clearly visible, with a mix of brown leather-like material and grey metallic components.

The beast stands in an imposing stance, facing the viewer directly. Neutral background to highlight the character's details.

The blue and white armor is visible along the side of the body, showcasing its intricate designs and glowing elements. One arm is partially visible, displaying the large claws. The character's posture suggests strength and readiness. Neutral background to maintain focus on the character.

Any additional accessories or design elements on the back are clearly shown. Neutral background to emphasize the character's design.

Neutral background to maintain emphasis on the character's top view.

6. Bottom-up view of the entire mythical beast character. The underside of the wolf-like head is visible, along with the full body in perspective. The blue and white armor is seen from below, showcasing its design on the lower body and feet. Large claws on all four limbs are prominently displayed. 1.   A frontal view showing the full body of the character, highlighting its facial features,  and its friendly smile. 

2.   A side profile from the left, displaying the character's profile, including its large wheels and the side design. 

3.   A rear view showcasing the back of the character, emphasizing the tow hook and any additional accessories. 

4.  A view from the right, capturing the character's dynamic pose and the flow of its design lines.

   Ensure that the background remains neutral and consistent across all images to maintain focus on the character's detailed design and various angles.

Her other hand is extended, fingers splayed, as magical energy visibly emanates from her fingertips. The pose is dynamic, with her body slightly twisted for dramatic effect.

0006_0024.instruction: Please generate a set of 5 images depicting a cyberpunk mech battle scene in the future. The first image shows a warrior wearing cyber armor standing in the center of a deserted city square, surrounded by the wreckage of battle; the second image depicts massive mechs engaged in combat amid the ruins of the city, with lasers flashing in the sky; the third image shows the warrior being repaired in an underground base filled with neon lights, where technicians are busy adjusting the armor; the fourth image depicts the warrior piloting their mech, flying between skyscrapers in a futuristic city; the fifth image shows the city after the battle, with collapsed skyscrapers, smoke rising in the air, and mech wreckage scattered on the ground. All images must follow the same consistent cyberpunk style.
sub_caption: A lone cyber-armored warrior stands in a desolate city square, surrounded by smoldering mech wreckage. Neon signs flicker dimly in the background, casting an eerie glow on the warrior's sleek, high-tech armor. Debris and broken machinery litter the cracked pavement, telling the tale of a fierce battle just concluded.

Massive mechs clash amid crumbling skyscrapers, their metallic bodies gleaming in the harsh light of laser fire. The night sky is ablaze with crisscrossing energy beams and explosions. Holographic displays flicker around the mechs as they engage in a deadly dance, their movements fluid despite their enormous size.

In a dimly lit underground base, the warrior lies on a repair platform, surrounded by bustling technicians. Neon tubes and holographic screens bathe the scene in a cyberpunk glow. Robotic arms and high-tech tools work on the warrior's damaged armor, while nearby consoles display intricate schematics and diagnostics.

The warrior, now piloting their mech, soars between towering neon-lit skyscrapers. The mech's sleek design cuts through the air, leaving a trail of light. Holographic billboards and flying vehicles populate the futuristic cityscape, creating a dense, vertical world of technology and light.

A post-battle cityscape reveals the aftermath of destruction. Collapsed skyscrapers lean precariously, their broken forms silhouetted against a smog-filled sky. Smoke rises from multiple points across the horizon. The ground is littered with the twisted metal of fallen mechs, their once-gleaming surfaces now scarred and broken.

0006_0024.Common_Instructions: All images adhere to a cyberpunk aesthetic with neon-lit environments, futuristic cityscapes, and consistent design elements for the warrior's armor and mechs. The color palette emphasizes electric blues, purples, and dark metallic tones to unify the narrative progression.
Set_Sub_Structure: A warrior in sleek cyber armor stands amidst the debris of a deserted city square. Neon holographic billboards flicker above, casting reflections on shattered glass and twisted metal. The warrior's armor features glowing circuitry patterns, and their stance conveys readiness for combat.

Giant mechs clash amid crumbling skyscrapers, their angular frames adorned with pulsating energy cores. Laser beams streak across a smog-filled sky, illuminating fractured buildings. The mechs' designs incorporate jagged edges and neon-accented weaponry, reinforcing a high-tech battleground.

Inside an underground base bathed in neon-blue lighting, the warrior sits surrounded by technicians with cybernetic enhancements. Repair drones hover nearby as damaged armor panels are replaced. Glowing holographic interfaces display diagnostics, emphasizing a blend of technology and grit.

The warrior pilots a streamlined mech soaring between towering skyscrapers. Neon advertisements and aerial traffic lanes form a chaotic backdrop. The mech's thrusters emit a vibrant cyan glow, contrasting with the dark metallic cityscape.

A post-battle cityscape shows collapsed structures veiled in smoke, with scattered mech wreckage glowing faintly. Flickering neon signs and smoldering debris create a desolate atmosphere, while distant intact buildings hint at the city's former grandeur.

0006_0025.instruction: Please generate 4 Cthulhu-style images, all depicting a desolate seaside scene. The first image shows a solitary lighthouse, old and worn, with a faint, flickering light surrounded by mysterious mist. The second image depicts the rocky shore beneath the lighthouse, with strange symbols and floating seaweed on the rocks. The third image shows a massive tentacle stranded on the shore, seemingly from an unknown deep-sea creature. The fourth image reveals a shadowy figure in the sea, as if a giant creature is lurking underwater. Keep all images in the Cthulhu style.
sub_caption: A solitary lighthouse stands tall against a gloomy, overcast sky. Its weathered exterior shows years of neglect, with peeling paint and rusted metal. A faint, flickering light emanates from the top, barely piercing through the thick, swirling mist that surrounds it. The atmosphere is eerie and foreboding, with an otherworldly quality typical of Cthulhu-inspired art.

The rocky shore beneath the lighthouse is revealed in unsettling detail. Jagged, dark rocks jut out from the water, their surfaces adorned with strange, eldritch symbols that seem to glow faintly. Masses of seaweed float unnaturally in the air, defying gravity. The water laps at the shore with an unnatural, oily sheen, suggesting something is not quite right in this Cthulhu-esque landscape.

A massive, sickly pale tentacle lies stranded on the shore, its surface glistening with an otherworldly slime. The tentacle is impossibly large, suggesting a creature of unimaginable size. Its suckers are lined with small, sharp teeth, and strange, phosphorescent patches glow along its length. The surrounding sand is disturbed, as if the tentacle had been thrashing before becoming still.

Just beneath the churning surface of the dark sea, a colossal shadowy figure looms. Its form is indistinct but unmistakably monstrous, with suggestions of multiple eyes and writhing appendages. The water above it seems to boil and froth, hinting at the creature's immense size and power. The scene captures the terrifying moment just before the entity might fully reveal itself, embodying the cosmic horror of the Cthulhu mythos.
0006_0025.Identity_Instructions: depicting a desolate seaside scene imbued with Cthulhu-style cosmic horror elements.
0006_0025.Common_Instructions: All images maintain a cohesive Cthulhu aesthetic with muted dark tones, eerie mist, and ominous undertones, unified by the seaside setting and subtle hints of ancient, otherworldly presence.
Set_Sub_Structure: An ancient lighthouse stands isolated atop jagged cliffs, its cracked stone walls covered in moss. A faint greenish light flickers from the lantern room, partially obscured by swirling mist that conceals indistinct shapes. The sky is heavy with storm clouds, suggesting an unnatural, lurking force.

A close-up of weathered rocks along the shore, etched with glowing runes of unknown origin. Slimy seaweed clings to crevices, undulating unnaturally as if alive. Dark water pools between stones reflect distorted shapes, creating an unsettling mirror effect.

A colossal, scaly tentacle lies half-buried in wet sand, its suckers oozing black ichor. The flesh shows bizarre mutations with protruding spines and bioluminescent patches. Distant waves crash against more shadowy masses partially submerged offshore.

A distorted silhouette looms beneath turbulent waves, its massive form blurred but suggesting multiple writhing appendages. The water swirls unnaturally around it, with faint glimpses of glowing eyes and jagged protrusions breaking the surface tension.

0006_0026.instruction: Please generate 5 Cthulhu-style images, depicting a cursed forest. The first image shows a vine-covered path, with thick mist in the air. The second image features a huge, twisted ancient tree, with faint faces emerging from its bark. The third image shows an abandoned stone altar, with ominous symbols carved into the surrounding stones. The fourth image depicts dolls hanging from the branches, each with a creepy smile on its face. The fifth image shows a dark lake, with strange glowing lights floating on the surface. Keep all images in the Cthulhu style.
sub_caption: A winding, vine-covered path through a dense, fog-shrouded forest. Twisted roots protrude from the ground, creating an uneven surface. The mist swirls ominously, partially obscuring gnarled trees with branches reaching out like claws. Faint, otherworldly whispers seem to emanate from the depths of the forest.

An enormous, ancient tree with a grotesquely twisted trunk dominates the scene. Its bark is gnarled and knotted, with subtle faces emerging from the wood grain. The faces appear to be in various states of anguish or madness. Tendrils of dark energy seem to pulse through the tree's roots, spreading into the surrounding soil.

A weathered stone altar stands in a small clearing, surrounded by moss-covered monoliths. Eldritch symbols are deeply carved into the stones, pulsing with a faint, sickly green glow. Shadows seem to writhe around the altar, and there's a sense of ancient, malevolent power emanating from the site.

Eerie dolls hang from tree branches by frayed ropes, their porcelain faces adorned with unnaturally wide, sinister smiles. Their eyes seem to follow the viewer, and there's a suggestion of movement when not directly observed. The surrounding trees are twisted and blackened, as if corrupted by the dolls' presence.

A dark, still lake reflects the cloudy sky above. Strange, bioluminescent lights float on the water's surface, casting an otherworldly glow. Hints of massive, tentacled shapes can be glimpsed just below the surface, suggesting the presence of ancient, unknowable creatures lurking in the depths.
0006_0026.Identity_Instructions: depicting a cursed forest imbued with cosmic horror elements.
0006_0026.Common_Instructions: All images follow the Cthulhu aesthetic, emphasizing grotesque organic forms, eldritch decay, and an oppressive atmosphere. Shared elements include muted color palettes, unnatural distortions in natural features, and subtle hints of ancient, unseen entities.
Set_Sub_Instruction: A narrow forest path overgrown with pulsating, vein-like vines under a sickly greenish mist. The path curves unnaturally, flanked by gnarled roots resembling skeletal fingers grasping at the fog. Distant silhouettes suggest amorphous shapes moving through the haze.

A colossal tree trunk twisted into spiraling patterns, its bark resembling cracked flesh revealing faint humanoid faces frozen in silent screams. Bioluminescent fungi cluster around the distorted visages, casting an unnatural turquoise glow across the trunk's writhing surface.

A hexagonal stone altar stained with dark residues, surrounded by weathered monoliths carved with non-Euclidean geometric patterns. The altar's surface reflects starlight impossibly through the canopy, while claw marks suggest recent sacrificial activity.

Dozens of cloth dolls suspended from branches by thorned vines, their stitched mouths forming asymmetrical grins. Button eyes glow faintly crimson, while limbs twist at unnatural angles as if frozen mid-movement. Moss grows selectively to resemble ritualistic sigils on their bodies.

A still lake reflecting distorted constellations not visible in the actual sky. Glowing cyan orbs hover above the water, their light revealing submerged tentacle-like roots undulating beneath the surface. A partially sunken stone archway disrupts the shoreline's symmetry.

0006_0027.instruction: Please generate 3 Cthulhu-style images, depicting an ancient city submerged underwater. The first image shows a field of fallen stone pillars and statues, covered in seaweed and shells. The second image displays the ruins of a main hall, with faint ancient runes on the walls and strange glowing creatures floating in the water. The third image shows a towering stone spire, with its top torn off by some force, and shadows of unknown creatures surrounding it. Keep all images in the Cthulhu style.
sub_caption: A vast underwater field of fallen stone pillars and colossal statues, remnants of an ancient Cthulhu-esque civilization. Massive, weathered columns lie scattered across the seafloor, partially buried in sand. Towering statues of eldritch beings with tentacled faces are toppled and broken. Thick, undulating seaweed clings to the stonework, while colorful shells and barnacles encrust the surfaces. Shafts of eerie, green-tinged light filter down from above, casting long shadows across the submerged ruins.

The crumbling remains of a grand underwater hall, once the centerpiece of a forgotten Cthulhu cult. Ornate archways and pillars, adorned with alien motifs, frame the scene. Faint, glowing runes of an unknown language pulse along the walls, casting an otherworldly blue light. Strange, bioluminescent creatures drift through the water - some jellyfish-like, others with multiple eyes and tentacles. Broken stone altars and fallen idols litter the hall's floor, hinting at ancient, eldritch rituals once performed here.

A monumental stone spire rises from the murky depths, its top violently torn away by some unimaginable force. The structure is adorned with bizarre carvings and bas-reliefs depicting cosmic horrors. Dark, writhing shadows of immense, unknowable creatures circle the spire, their forms barely discernible in the gloom. Streams of bubbles rise from unseen crevices at the base, suggesting hidden chambers or passages. The water around the spire seems to shimmer with an unnatural, oily quality, adding to the ominous Cthulhu-inspired atmosphere.
0006_0027.Identity_Instructions: an ancient underwater city submerged in a Cthulhu-style aesthetic.
0006_0027.Common_Instructions: All images maintain a dark, eerie Cthulhu style with aquatic decay, featuring submerged ruins, bioluminescent glows, and ominous shadows to evoke cosmic dread and forgotten civilizations.
Set_Sub_Structure: A vast field of collapsed stone pillars and shattered statues, overgrown with tangled seaweed and clusters of barnacles. The structures tilt at unnatural angles, partially buried in silt, with faint light filtering through murky water to accentuate textures of erosion and marine decay.

A grand dilapidated hall with cracked walls adorned by faintly glowing runes of unknown origin. Translucent jellyfish-like creatures pulse with bioluminescence as they drift near broken columns, casting eerie shadows that distort the water’s depth and scale.

A jagged stone spire rising from the abyss, its upper section violently sheared off. Distorted shadows of tentacled creatures loom in the dark water around it, their forms blurred but menacing, while currents stir silt to obscure the spire’s base.

0006_0028.instruction: Please generate 6 Cthulhu-style images, depicting an ancient underground cave sealed by a mysterious force. The first image shows the cave entrance, surrounded by strange symbols and bones. The second image displays the walls inside the cave, covered with dark murals depicting a massive creature. The third image shows an ancient well deep within the cave, with faint light flickering from within. The fourth image depicts a dark underground river, with unidentified glowing fragments floating on the surface. The fifth image shows a stone door at the end of the cave, carved with ancient spells. The sixth image reveals a dark abyss beyond the door, with massive shadows moving within. Keep all images in the Cthulhu style.
sub_caption: A foreboding cave entrance looms before you, its jagged opening resembling a monstrous maw. Eerie, glowing symbols of unknown origin are etched into the surrounding rock face. Scattered bones and skulls of various creatures litter the ground, their surfaces covered in a sickly green patina. Tendrils of mist curl around the entrance, as if the cave itself is breathing.

Inside the cave, massive walls stretch upward, adorned with dark, unsettling murals. The paintings depict a colossal, tentacled entity rising from the depths of an ancient sea. Human-like figures cower in fear or prostrate themselves in worship. The murals seem to writhe and shift in the dim light, creating an illusion of movement that sends chills down your spine.

Deep within the cavern stands an ancient stone well, its rim worn smooth by countless years. A faint, pulsating light emanates from its depths, casting eerie shadows on the surrounding rock. Strange, squid-like carvings adorn the well's exterior, their eyes seeming to follow your movements. The air around the well feels thick and oppressive, as if some unseen force is trying to keep you away.

A dark underground river flows silently through the cave, its inky surface broken only by mysterious glowing fragments. These ethereal shards drift lazily along the current, emitting an otherworldly blue-green light. The river's banks are lined with oddly shaped stalagmites that resemble twisted, reaching hands. An oppressive silence hangs over the scene, broken only by the occasional drip of water.

At the cave's terminus looms an imposing stone door, its surface intricately carved with eldritch symbols and spells in an unknown language. The door radiates an aura of ancient power and forbidden knowledge. Grotesque figures resembling a mix of human and sea creature are depicted in various poses of agony or ecstasy around the door's frame. A sense of dread permeates the air, warning of the horrors that may lie beyond.

Beyond the opened stone door lies a vast, unfathomable abyss. Darkness stretches endlessly, occasionally broken by fleeting glimpses of massive, writhing shadows. Tentacles as thick as tree trunks momentarily appear before vanishing back into the void. A faint, maddening whisper echoes from the depths, promising both revelation and insanity to those who dare venture further.
0006_0028.Identity_Instructions: an ancient underground cave sealed by mysterious forces, rendered in a Cthulhu-inspired aesthetic.
0006_0028.Common_Instructions: All images maintain a dark, ominous Cthulhu style with eerie textures, cosmic horror elements, and a color palette dominated by murky greens, deep blacks, and faint glowing accents. Mysterious symbols and ancient decay permeate every scene.

Uneven cave walls covered in crumbling murals depicting tentacled cosmic entities looming over kneeling humanoid figures. The paintings shift subtly under faint bioluminescent fungi light, creating an illusion of movement in the ancient artwork.

A circular stone well with grotesque carvings of tentacled faces along its rim. Pale blue light pulses rhythmically from the well's depths, casting distorted shadows that suggest amorphous shapes rising through stagnant water below.

A subterranean river flowing silently between slick obsidian banks. Glowing prismatic shards float on the ink-black water, their reflections forming distorted runes. Half-submerged stone pillars show eroded carvings of cyclopean architecture.

A massive stone door embedded in a cavern wall, covered in glowing crimson hieroglyphs that writhe like serpents. The door's surface absorbs surrounding light, while claw marks and dried ichor stains suggest failed attempts to breach it.

A yawning chasm filled with swirling black mist, backlit by occasional flashes of sickly violet light. Colossal silhouettes with multiple limbs and writhing appendages loom in the distance, their forms defying clear perception despite their overwhelming scale.

0006_0029.instruction: Please generate a set of 5 sketch-style images depicting a peaceful countryside scene. The first image shows a stone bridge by a river, with the water gently flowing and tall grass growing on the banks; the second image is of a cottage in the countryside, with smoke rising from the chimney and rolling fields and distant hills in the background; the third image depicts a villager working in the fields, pushing a wooden cart, with vast farmland stretching behind; the fourth image shows the sunset, with the sky bathed in soft colors, and the silhouette of trees against the sun; the fifth image is of a starry night sky, with the village below illuminated by the calm of the night.
sub_caption: A stone bridge arches gracefully over a gently flowing river. The bridge's weathered stones are detailed with fine lines. Tall grass and wildflowers sway on the riverbanks, their delicate stems sketched with light strokes. The water's surface is suggested by subtle ripples and reflections.

A quaint cottage nestles in the countryside, its thatched roof and timber frame carefully outlined. Wisps of smoke curl from the chimney, blending into the sky. Rolling fields stretch out before the cottage, their contours softly drawn. In the distance, hills rise in gentle curves, creating a serene backdrop.

A villager, sketched with simple yet expressive lines, pushes a wooden cart along a dirt path. The figure's posture conveys effort and purpose. Behind them, vast farmland unfolds in a patchwork of fields, each plot defined by light shading and texture to suggest different crops.

The setting sun bathes the sky in a soft glow, rendered with delicate gradations of shading. Silhouettes of trees stand in stark contrast against the luminous sky, their branches reaching upwards. The horizon is marked by a thin, decisive line, separating earth and sky.

A starry night sky stretches across the top of the image, filled with countless pinpricks of light. Below, the village is softly outlined, with windows glowing warmly. The contrast between the dark sky and illuminated buildings creates a sense of calm and quiet in the night scene.
0006_0029.Identity_Instructions: depicting a peaceful countryside scene in a sketch-style aesthetic.
0006_0029.Common_Instructions: All images share a rustic, tranquil countryside theme rendered in loose, expressive sketch lines with minimal shading, emphasizing natural elements and harmony between human activity and the environment.
Set_Sub_Structure: A weathered stone arch bridge spanning a calm river, with gentle ripples in the water and tall reeds swaying along the banks. Rough-textured stones and uneven wooden railings add character, while distant wildflowers dot the grassy edges.

A thatched-roof cottage with ivy climbing its walls, thin smoke curling from a brick chimney. Rolling fields of crops and wild grasses extend toward softly outlined hills, with a dirt path winding toward the horizon.

A villager in a wide-brimmed hat pushing a wooden cart loaded with hay along a dirt path. Farmland stretches endlessly behind, with furrowed soil and scattered tools hinting at daily labor, under a lightly sketched cloudy sky.

A sun low on the horizon casts warm amber and lavender hues across the sky. Bare-branched trees stand in silhouette against the glowing orb, their elongated shadows stretching over a quiet meadow with fading daylight.

A night sky dense with tiny stippled stars and a crescent moon above clustered village rooftops. Faint candlelight glows in cottage windows, while silhouetted fences and leafless trees frame the serene, ink-blue landscape.

0006_0030.instruction: Please generate a set of 6 sketch-style images depicting a classical European city. The first image is of a city square with a statue in the center, surrounded by ancient stone buildings; the second image shows the exterior of a grand cathedral, its spire reaching towards the sky with pigeons flying around; the third image depicts a narrow alley with a café, where a few patrons are enjoying coffee at outdoor tables, with bustling streets in the distance; the fourth image shows a bridge over a river, with reflections of the buildings on the water's surface; the fifth image shows the city at night, with street lamps casting light onto cobblestone streets as people walk by; the sixth image provides a distant panoramic view of the city, with red-tiled roofs and mountain ranges in the background.
sub_caption: A bustling city square in sketch style. At its center stands a grand statue, likely of a historical figure. Surrounding the square are ancient stone buildings with ornate facades, arched windows, and decorative cornices. People are milling about, some admiring the statue, others hurrying across the cobblestone pavement. Horse-drawn carriages and street vendors add to the lively atmosphere.

The majestic exterior of a Gothic cathedral in sketch style. Its towering spire reaches towards the sky, adorned with intricate stonework and gargoyles. Flying buttresses support the massive structure. Pigeons circle the spire and perch on ledges. At ground level, elaborate stained glass windows and a grand entrance with carved wooden doors are visible. A few people on the steps provide scale to the immense building.

A charming narrow alley scene in sketch style. In the foreground, a quaint café with a striped awning has several small round tables on the cobblestone street. Patrons sit enjoying their coffee, some engaged in conversation. Flower boxes hang from windows above. The alley opens up to busier streets in the distance, where you can see people walking and the outlines of more buildings, creating a sense of depth.

A picturesque bridge over a river in sketch style. The bridge is an old stone arch design with ornate lampposts. On the river, a few small boats are visible. The water's surface reflects the buildings lining the riverbanks, creating a mirror-like effect. Trees line parts of the riverbank, and people are seen strolling across the bridge or pausing to look at the view.

A nighttime city scene in sketch style. Warm light spills from ornate street lamps onto shiny cobblestone streets. The buildings cast long shadows, creating a dramatic interplay of light and dark. A few people walk along the sidewalks, their silhouettes elongated. Shop windows glow invitingly, and perhaps a horse-drawn carriage clip-clops down the street, adding to the romantic atmosphere.

The city sprawls out, showing a mix of architectural styles from different eras. In the distance, a mountain range provides a dramatic backdrop. The sketch captures the density of the urban landscape while also showing the natural beauty surrounding it. A few birds soar in the sky, adding movement to the scene.

A towering Gothic cathedral with flying buttresses and intricate stone carvings. Pigeons circle the pointed spire against a partly cloudy sky, with shallow shading emphasizing the structure's verticality and weathered texture.

A winding alley framed by leaning buildings with flower boxes under windows. A café with striped awning hosts patrons at iron tables, steam rising from cups. Distorted perspective suggests depth towards busy streets in blurred background.

A stone arched bridge spanning a calm river, reflecting symmetrical building facades with shuttered windows. Gentle ripples break the reflection's clarity, with faint boat outlines near the riverbanks.

Nighttime streets illuminated by wrought-iron lanterns casting warm circular glows. Cobblestones show chalky texture under light pools, with silhouetted figures walking past shuttered shops and glowing upper-story windows.

0006_0031.instruction: Please generate a set of 4 sketch-style images depicting a busy marketplace. The first image shows the entrance to the market, where vendors are setting up their goods, and the streets are filled with people; the second image depicts the stalls filled with neatly arranged fruits and vegetables, while customers browse and select their purchases; the third image shows a street performer playing an instrument, surrounded by a crowd of onlookers; the fourth image depicts the market winding down at sunset, with vendors packing up their goods as the warm light casts long shadows on the stalls.
sub_caption: Sketch-style image of a bustling marketplace entrance. Vendors are setting up their stalls, arranging colorful goods on tables and hanging items from awnings. The street is filled with people of various ages, some carrying baskets or bags, others pushing carts. In the background, a large archway or sign marks the official entrance to the market. The scene is full of energy and anticipation for the day ahead.

Sketch-style image of market stalls brimming with fresh produce. Neatly arranged pyramids of fruits and baskets overflowing with vegetables create a vibrant display. Customers examine the goods, some picking up items to inspect them closely. Vendors stand behind their stalls, ready to assist. The scene is alive with activity, showcasing the abundance and variety of the marketplace.

Sketch-style image of a street performer in the marketplace. A musician, perhaps playing a guitar or accordion, stands in an open space surrounded by a semicircle of captivated onlookers. Some people are clapping along, while others drop coins into an open instrument case. The performer's animated expression and the crowd's engagement create a lively focal point amidst the market's hustle and bustle.

Sketch-style image of the marketplace at sunset. Long shadows stretch across the scene as vendors begin to pack up their goods. Some stalls are already covered with tarps, while others are in the process of being dismantled. The warm, golden light of the setting sun bathes the market in a soft glow, creating a peaceful contrast to the day's earlier activity. A few last-minute shoppers hurry to make final purchases before the market closes for the day.

0006_0032.instruction: Please generate a set of 5 sketch-style images depicting the sea and coastline. The first image shows a tall lighthouse standing by the shore, with waves crashing against the rocks in the background; the second image depicts a fishing boat sailing on the sea, with the crew busily working, and the wind blowing through the sails; the third image shows distant rocks, where waves are splashing high against the stone; the fourth image depicts a small fishing village by the sea, with rooftops blending into the horizon and the vast ocean beyond; the fifth image shows a sunset over the sea, with the sky glowing golden and fishing boats slowly returning to the harbor.
sub_caption: A tall, solitary lighthouse stands proudly on a rocky shore. Powerful waves crash dramatically against the jagged rocks at its base. The sky above is filled with swirling clouds, emphasizing the lighthouse's role as a beacon of safety amidst the turbulent sea.

A sturdy fishing boat sails on choppy waters. The crew members are scattered across the deck, pulling nets and sorting their catch. The boat's sails billow in the strong wind, propelling the vessel forward. Seagulls circle overhead, hoping for scraps.

Massive, craggy rocks jut out of the sea in the distance. Enormous waves slam against these stone sentinels, sending spray high into the air. The power of the ocean is evident in the foamy white water surrounding the rocks, contrasting with the darker sea beyond.

A quaint fishing village nestles along the coastline. Charming cottages with slanted roofs dot the hillside, their chimneys releasing wisps of smoke. The rooftops seem to merge with the horizon where they meet the vast, endless ocean. A few small boats bob in the village harbor.

The sun sets over a tranquil sea, painting the sky in vibrant golds and oranges. Silhouettes of fishing boats slowly make their way back to the harbor, their day's work done. The water reflects the warm hues of the sky, creating a peaceful and serene atmosphere as day turns to night.

A wooden fishing boat tilts slightly as it cuts through choppy waves. Sailors haul nets on deck, sketched with quick gestural lines. The billowing sails show directional shading to imply strong winds.
Dramatic waves explode against towering offshore rock formations. Spray arcs upward in swift, sweeping pencil lines, contrasting with the dark angular shapes of weathered stone.
A cluster of cottages with sloped roofs nestles along a curved bay. Fishing nets dry on wooden posts, drawn with crosshatched textures. The horizon blends sea and sky using soft smudged strokes.
A blazing sunset casts golden highlights on gentle waves. Silhouetted boats glide toward a harbor, their masts forming rhythmic vertical lines against the warm, loosely shaded sky.

0006_0033.instruction: Please generate a set of 5 woodcut-style images depicting an ancient mountain temple. The first image shows the temple entrance, with a large stone gate standing between towering mountains and bamboo groves in the background; the second image is of the temple courtyard, where monks are meditating, surrounded by trees and stone carvings that evoke a sense of serenity and reverence; the third image shows the temple's bell tower, where an ancient copper bell hangs inside a wooden tower, with low clouds in the distance; the fourth image depicts the temple's hallway, where wind chimes hang on both sides, softly ringing in the breeze; the fifth image shows the temple's prayer room, where monks are quietly praying by candlelight, with plain stone walls in the background.
sub_caption: A woodcut-style image of an ancient mountain temple entrance. A large, ornate stone gate stands prominently in the foreground, its intricate carvings weathered by time. Towering, misty mountains loom in the background, their peaks barely visible. Dense bamboo groves flank the sides of the gate, creating a natural frame. The stark black and white contrasts of the woodcut style emphasize the textures of stone, wood, and foliage.

A woodcut-style depiction of the temple courtyard. Monks in flowing robes sit in meditation postures on stone platforms. Ancient trees with gnarled trunks and spreading branches provide shade. Intricately carved stone statues and pillars are scattered throughout the courtyard, their details sharp in the woodcut style. The overall composition evokes a profound sense of serenity and spiritual reverence.

A woodcut-style image focusing on the temple's bell tower. A massive, ancient copper bell hangs inside a multi-tiered wooden structure, its surface etched with intricate patterns. The tower's architecture is emphasized through bold lines and contrasts. In the distance, low-hanging clouds roll between mountain peaks, creating a mystical atmosphere. The woodcut technique accentuates the textures of wood, metal, and mist.

A woodcut-style illustration of the temple's hallway. Long corridors stretch into the distance, their wooden beams and stone floors detailed in sharp black and white contrasts. Delicate wind chimes hang from the eaves on both sides, their shapes suggesting gentle movement. The composition captures the sense of a breeze passing through, with the implied soft ringing of the chimes adding an auditory element to the visual scene.

A woodcut-style representation of the temple's prayer room. Monks kneel in silent prayer, their forms simplified yet expressive. Flickering candles cast dramatic shadows on plain stone walls, the interplay of light and dark emphasized by the woodcut technique. The sparse furnishings and unadorned walls focus attention on the spiritual atmosphere. The overall image conveys a sense of quiet devotion and timelessness.

A wooden bell tower with a tiered roof, housing a large copper bell adorned with faded symbols. The tower's beams showcase geometric woodcut patterns. Distant mountains are partially obscured by layers of drifting clouds, creating depth and mystery.

A narrow hallway with exposed wooden rafters and wind chimes suspended from red cords. The chimes sway subtly, their delicate forms contrasting with the rough-hewn walls. Faint streaks of light filter through gaps in the structure, casting dynamic shadows.

A dim prayer room illuminated by clusters of candles on stone altars. Monks kneel before a simple shrine, their silhouettes merging with the flickering light. Plain stone walls display faint etchings of lotus motifs, echoing the room’s minimalist reverence.

0006_0034.instruction: Please generate a set of 6 woodcut-style images depicting a bustling fishing village. The first image shows fishermen rowing their boats out to sea at sunrise, with the light reflecting off the rippling water; the second image is of the village pier, where boats are docked and fishermen are repairing their nets; the third image depicts the village market, with stalls filled with freshly caught seafood, and villagers busily trading; the fourth image shows the village houses, with seaweed-covered roofs and elders chatting in front of their homes; the fifth image shows fishing boats returning to the harbor at sunset, with the sky ablaze in red and orange hues; the sixth image depicts the village at night, with waves gently lapping against the shore, and the village lights reflecting on the calm sea.
sub_caption: Woodcut-style image of fishermen at sunrise. Silhouettes of small fishing boats with men rowing, their oars creating ripples in the water. The rising sun casts long shadows and creates a warm glow on the horizon. Seabirds circle overhead in the brightening sky.

Woodcut-style image of a busy village pier. Wooden docks extend into the water, with various fishing boats tied up. Fishermen sit on crates, mending their nets with skilled hands. Coils of rope and stacked lobster traps line the weathered planks.

Woodcut-style image of a lively village market. Wooden stalls overflow with an array of fish and seafood. Villagers haggle over prices, baskets in hand. A fishmonger scales a large fish, while children dart between the busy shoppers.

Woodcut-style image of traditional fishing village houses. Quaint cottages with thatched roofs covered in dried seaweed. Elderly villagers sit on benches, deep in conversation. Fishing nets and buoys hang from the walls, drying in the sea breeze.

Woodcut-style image of fishing boats returning at sunset. Silhouettes of boats against a dramatic sky streaked with bold lines representing vibrant reds and oranges. Seagulls swoop low over the water as fishermen guide their vessels home.

Woodcut-style image of the village at night. Moonlight reflects off the calm sea surface. Soft glows from cottage windows create a warm atmosphere. A lighthouse beam sweeps across the water, and a few late-night fishermen can be seen on the shore.

Cluster of cottages with steep, seaweed-thatched roofs near the shore. Elders sit on driftwood benches gesturing expressively, their faces lined with experience. Fishing tools lean against whitewashed walls under a soft afternoon light.

In the background, rugged mountain ranges rise up, their peaks partially obscured by low-hanging clouds. The grass is rendered with bold, sweeping lines to convey the vastness of the plain.

Outside, saddles are propped against the yurt's wall, and ornate water jugs sit nearby. The texture of the yurt's felt covering is emphasized through intricate linework, contrasting with the simpler lines of the surrounding grassland.

A serene woodcut-style depiction of sunrise over the grassland. The sun peeks over the horizon, its rays dramatically breaking through layered clouds. The light casts long shadows across the land, highlighting the texture of the grass. Cattle graze peacefully in the foreground and middle distance, their forms silhouetted against the brightening sky. The vastness of the grassland is emphasized by the horizon stretching across the entire image.

A atmospheric night scene in woodcut style, showcasing a herders' camp on the grassland. The sky is filled with a multitude of stars, their pinpricks of light contrasting sharply with the dark sky. Below, several campfires cast a warm glow on clustered tents. The flames are rendered with bold, flickering lines, while the surrounding darkness is created through deep, rich blacks, emphasizing the coziness of the camp amidst the vast, night-shrouded grassland.

0006_0036.instruction: Please generate a set of 3 woodcut-style images depicting a medieval European castle. The first image shows the castle's grand entrance, with massive stone walls and a moat surrounding the fortress, with mountains and forests in the distance; the second image depicts the castle's inner courtyard, where knights are training under the warm sunlight on stone-paved grounds; the third image shows the castle's high tower, with a flag billowing in the wind, and the distant outline of a village visible on the horizon.
sub_caption: A woodcut-style image of a medieval European castle's grand entrance. Massive stone walls rise imposingly, surrounded by a wide moat filled with dark water. A drawbridge leads to the fortified gatehouse with its heavy wooden doors and portcullis. Tall towers flank the entrance, their arrow slits barely visible. In the background, rugged mountains and dense forests create a dramatic backdrop, emphasizing the castle's strategic position in the landscape.

A woodcut-style depiction of the castle's inner courtyard. Knights in full armor are engaged in various training exercises on stone-paved grounds. Some practice swordplay, while others joust on horseback. Squires and pages bustle about, tending to equipment. The warm sunlight casts strong shadows, accentuating the textures of the stone walls and wooden structures surrounding the courtyard. Banners and heraldic flags hang from the walls, adding splashes of color to the scene.

A woodcut-style illustration of the castle's high tower. The tall, circular stone structure dominates the image, its crenellated top clearly visible. A large flag billows dramatically in the wind from the tower's peak, its intricate design suggesting the castle's allegiance. From this vantage point, the landscape stretches out below, with fields and forests giving way to the distant outline of a village on the horizon. The bold lines and stark contrasts typical of woodcut art emphasize the tower's strength and the vastness of the surrounding countryside.

Unified Elements:
• Art Style & Colors: Futuristic neon glow with a dark, rain-soaked cityscape. Utilize bold neon blue, hot pink, and deep purple accents against muted blacks and grays.
• Header: “CYBER CITY” in a sleek, digital typeface positioned at the top.
• Background: A sprawling urban environment featuring holographic billboards, rain reflections, and futuristic architecture.
• Typography: Minimalist, tech-inspired fonts throughout the design.

Individual Focus:
• Poster 1 – Rooftop Vigil: Center on a lone cyber-enhanced protagonist perched on a skyscraper, overlooking the neon-lit city below.
• Poster 2 – High-Speed Chase: Emphasize a dynamic scene with futuristic vehicles streaking through rain-soaked streets.
• Poster 3 – Urban Landmark: Highlight an iconic cybernetic monument illuminated by shifting neon lights.
• Poster 4 – Digital Dystopia: Feature a scene of a bustling street market infused with digital overlays and augmented reality elements.
sub_caption: Cyberpunk poster titled "CYBER CITY: Rooftop Vigil". A lone cyber-enhanced figure crouches on the edge of a towering skyscraper, silhouetted against a vast, neon-lit cityscape. The sky is dark and filled with holographic billboards. Rain cascades down, creating reflective puddles on the rooftop. The figure's cybernetic enhancements glow with blue and pink accents, contrasting sharply with the muted grays and blacks of the surrounding architecture. Sleek, minimalist typography adds subtle details to the composition.

Cyberpunk poster titled "CYBER CITY: High-Speed Chase". A thrilling scene of futuristic vehicles racing through rain-slicked streets. Sleek hovercars with glowing neon trails streak past, leaving blurred light trails of hot pink and electric blue. The background features towering skyscrapers with cascading digital displays. Rain droplets are frozen in mid-air, illuminated by the surrounding neon lights. The scene is framed by the reflections in puddles, creating a mirror-like effect of the chase above and below.

Cyberpunk poster titled "CYBER CITY: Urban Landmark". A massive cybernetic monument dominates the center of the image, its form a blend of organic and mechanical elements. The structure is illuminated by shifting neon lights that pulse from blue to purple to pink. Surrounding the monument are holographic projections and floating digital information. The cityscape in the background is a tapestry of interconnected buildings and elevated walkways. Rain falls steadily, creating a misty atmosphere that softens the harsh neon glow.

Cyberpunk poster titled "CYBER CITY: Digital Dystopia". A bustling street market scene infused with augmented reality elements. Vendors' stalls are a mix of physical objects and holographic displays. Crowds of diverse, cybernetically enhanced individuals move through the market, their bodies partially obscured by floating AR interfaces. Neon signs and holographic advertisements compete for attention overhead. The scene is awash in a mix of deep purples and blues, punctuated by bright pink accents. Rain creates a hazy, reflective sheen on surfaces throughout the market.

0007_0001.Common_Instructions: All posters maintain a neon-drenched cyberpunk style with dark, rain-reflective cityscapes, holographic billboards, and the 'CYBER CITY' header in sleek digital typography. Shared elements include neon blue, pink, and purple accents against muted backgrounds, minimalist tech fonts, and immersive urban futurism.

Neon lights from towering buildings cast reflections on rain-slick armor, while holographic advertisements flicker in the distance. The figure's glowing ocular implants pierce the misty night.

Futuristic hover vehicles streak through flooded streets, neon underglows creating vibrant trails on wet asphalt. Motion blur emphasizes speed as rain cascades across transparent cockpit canopies. Broken hologram projections hover above the chaotic chase.

A towering cybernetic monument dominates the scene, its angular structure pulsating with animated neon circuits. Reflective puddles at its base mirror the shifting light patterns, while augmented reality tags float around its midsection.

A crowded street market buzzes with layered realities - holographic vendors project wares above physical stalls, augmented reality UI elements float around shoppers, and neon signage clashes with digital pop-up advertisements. Rain drips through translucent holograms creating visual interference.

0007_0002.instruction:
Generate a series of 3 posters for a classic space adventure film that share a unified retro-futuristic style, yet each emphasizes a unique central theme.

Unified Elements:
• Art Style & Colors: Retro-futuristic design with bold geometric shapes and a pastel palette (teal, pink, and orange) contrasted against deep space blues.
• Header: “GALACTIC ODYSSEY” in vintage, stylized lettering at the top.
• Background: A stylized cosmic landscape featuring stars, nebulas, and retro starburst effects.
• Typography: Classic, bold fonts with a slightly distressed look reminiscent of old sci-fi posters.

Individual Focus:
• Poster 1 – Rocket Launch: Center on a vintage rocket blasting off with dynamic speed lines and a burst of cosmic energy.
• Poster 2 – Interstellar Battle: Emphasize a dramatic scene with retro spaceship silhouettes engaged in a cosmic dogfight.
• Poster 3 – Cosmic Exploration: Feature a lone astronaut drifting in space, with distant planets and a serene, expansive star field as the backdrop.
sub_caption: Retro-futuristic poster for "GALACTIC ODYSSEY" featuring a rocket launch. The top of the poster displays the title in vintage, stylized lettering. The background is a cosmic landscape with teal, pink, and orange pastel hues contrasting against deep space blues. Stars, nebulas, and retro starburst effects fill the sky. At the center, a sleek, vintage-style rocket blasts off, surrounded by dynamic speed lines and a burst of cosmic energy. Bold geometric shapes frame the composition. The typography is classic and slightly distressed, evoking nostalgia for old sci-fi posters.

Second poster in the "GALACTIC ODYSSEY" series, focusing on an interstellar battle. The retro-futuristic design maintains the pastel palette of teal, pink, and orange against deep space blues. The stylized title appears at the top in vintage lettering. The cosmic background features geometric nebulas and starburst effects. The central focus is a dramatic scene of retro spaceship silhouettes engaged in a cosmic dogfight, with laser beams and explosions rendered in bold, stylized forms. Classic, distressed fonts add to the vintage sci-fi aesthetic.

Third poster for "GALACTIC ODYSSEY", emphasizing cosmic exploration. The retro-futuristic style continues with the pastel color scheme and bold geometric shapes. The vintage-style title crowns the poster. The background showcases a serene, expansive star field with distant planets and stylized nebulas. At the center, a lone astronaut in a retro spacesuit drifts peacefully, conveying a sense of wonder and isolation. The astronaut's reflection is visible in their helmet visor, adding depth to the image. Vintage-inspired typography completes the classic sci-fi poster look.

Retro starburst effects radiate from the launch site, framed by teal and orange gradients. Geometric shapes in the background echo retro sci-fi aesthetics.

Silhouettes of angular retro spaceships engaged in a dogfight, with laser beams crisscrossing the scene. The central ship emits glowing pink energy, contrasting against swirling nebula patterns and sharp starburst explosions. Diagonal motion lines emphasize dramatic tension.

A lone astronaut floats near a hexagonal space capsule, gazing toward distant planets with a teal-and-pink hue. Serene star fields and soft nebula clouds stretch across the backdrop, punctuated by geometric starbursts. The composition balances vast emptiness with exploratory wonder.

0007_0003.instruction:
Generate a series of 3 Mystery Noir posters that share a dark, vintage aesthetic with a consistent mood and design, while each poster highlights a different narrative element.

Unified Elements:
• Art Style & Colors: Noir-inspired high-contrast black-and-white imagery with selective splashes of red for dramatic effect.
• Header: “NOIR MYSTERY” in elegant Art Deco lettering set at the top.
• Background: Urban nightscapes with rainy streets, fog, and shadowy silhouettes of city buildings.
• Typography: Sleek, vintage fonts that echo the mysterious atmosphere.

Individual Focus:
• Poster 1 – The Detective: Feature a lone detective in a trench coat under a flickering streetlamp, with a backdrop of rain-drenched cobblestone streets.
• Poster 2 – The Femme Fatale: Highlight a mysterious woman with an enigmatic expression, framed by a backdrop of smoky interiors and neon reflections.
• Poster 3 – The Confrontation: Emphasize a tense standoff between shadowy figures in a dimly lit alley, with dramatic contrasts of light and shadow.
sub_caption:
Noir Mystery Poster 1 - The Detective

A high-contrast black-and-white image with splashes of red. At the top, "NOIR MYSTERY" is displayed in elegant Art Deco lettering. The scene depicts a rain-soaked urban nightscape with foggy, shadowy silhouettes of city buildings in the background. In the foreground, a lone detective stands under a flickering streetlamp, his face partially obscured by the brim of his hat. He wears a long trench coat, creating a mysterious silhouette. The detective is surrounded by glistening, rain-drenched cobblestone streets that reflect the dim light. Puddles on the ground mirror the neon signs of nearby establishments, adding to the atmospheric noir aesthetic.

Noir Mystery Poster 2 - The Femme Fatale

A high-contrast black-and-white image with strategic red accents. "NOIR MYSTERY" is prominently displayed at the top in Art Deco style. The background shows a hazy urban skyline at night. The focal point is a mysterious woman with an enigmatic expression, her face partially illuminated by neon light. She's positioned in a smoky interior, perhaps a dimly lit bar or lounge. Reflections of neon signs play across her features and the glossy surfaces around her, creating an air of intrigue and danger. Her red lipstick stands out as a vibrant splash of color against the monochrome palette.

Noir Mystery Poster 3 - The Confrontation

A dramatic black-and-white composition with touches of red, featuring "NOIR MYSTERY" in Art Deco lettering at the top. The scene is set in a narrow, dimly lit alley flanked by tall, shadowy buildings. Two silhouetted figures face each other in a tense standoff. Stark contrasts between light and shadow create a sense of drama and danger. A single red neon sign in the background casts an eerie glow, reflecting off wet surfaces and adding to the tense atmosphere. The urban nightscape looms ominously above, with fog rolling in to heighten the sense of mystery and impending conflict.
0007_0003.Identity_Instructions: Mystery Noir posters with dark vintage aesthetics and urban nightscapes featuring dramatic contrasts and selective red accents.
0007_0003.Common_Instructions: All posters share high-contrast black-and-white noir styling with Art Deco 'NOIR MYSTERY' headers, rainy/foggy urban backgrounds, and vintage typography. Red accents highlight key elements while maintaining moody coherence.

A sharp-dressed femme fatale leans against a bar counter, her red lipstick mirrored in neon-lit smoke patterns behind her. Diamond earrings catch faint light as her sidelong gaze suggests hidden motives, framed by art deco window reflections.

Two shadowy figures face off in a narrow alley, their silhouettes sliced by slanted light from a distant red neon sign. Rain streaks diagonally through the air as tension radiates from a gleaming revolver and a clenched fist in adjacent pools of light.

Generate a series of 4 classic comic book posters that share a unified, dynamic design style while spotlighting different iconic scenes.

• Header: “ACTION HEROES” in an explosive, comic-style font at the top.
• Background: Halftone patterns and retro comic panel elements that evoke a vintage comic book feel.
• Typography: Impactful, energetic lettering that enhances the dynamic mood.

Individual Focus:
• Poster 1 – Heroic Pose: Center on the main protagonist striking an iconic, dramatic pose with an explosive background effect.
• Poster 2 – Villain Showdown: Emphasize a tense battle scene between the hero and a formidable villain, captured in dynamic action.
• Poster 3 – High-Speed Chase: Highlight a chase sequence across a bustling cityscape, with motion blur and dramatic angles.
• Poster 4 – Team-Up Action: Feature a scene showcasing a team of heroes collaborating, with each character’s unique attributes clearly visible.
sub_caption: Classic comic book poster with a bold, graphic design style using primary colors (red, blue, yellow) and thick black outlines. The header "ACTION HEROES" appears at the top in an explosive, comic-style font. The background features halftone patterns and retro comic panel elements. In the center, a muscular superhero strikes a dramatic pose, fist raised to the sky, cape billowing behind them. An explosive starburst effect radiates from the hero, emphasizing their power. Energetic typography adds to the dynamic mood, with words like "POWER!" and "JUSTICE!" integrated into the design.

Classic comic book poster with a bold, graphic design style using primary colors (red, blue, yellow) and thick black outlines. The header "ACTION HEROES" appears at the top in an explosive, comic-style font. The background features halftone patterns and retro comic panel elements. The poster depicts an intense battle scene between a hero and a menacing villain. They clash in mid-air, fists colliding with a visible shockwave. The hero's determined expression contrasts with the villain's sinister grin. Dramatic onomatopoeia like "POW!" and "WHAM!" punctuate the action.

0007_0007.instruction:
Generate a series of "Kung Fu Panda" posters that share a unified style but feature different central characters. Use the following guidelines:

Unified Elements:

Art Style & Colors: Vintage, stylized art with an earthy palette (orange, green, brown).
Top Element: DreamWorks logo on a green and black background.
Background: Traditional Chinese architecture elements (temples, mountains) with a red sky.
Title: "KUNG FU PANDA" in bold, stylized letters with a bamboo pattern at the bottom.
Individual Focus:

Poster 1: Focus on Panda Po in a dynamic kung fu pose.
Poster 2: Focus on Tigress, highlighting her unique characteristics.
Poster 3: Focus on Monkey, emphasizing energetic action.
Poster 4: Feature another character (e.g., Mantis, Crane, Shifu, or Viper) as the center, with a creative composition.
sub_caption:
Kung Fu Panda Poster 1: Po
A vintage-style poster with an earthy color palette. At the top, the DreamWorks logo sits on a green and black background. The background features misty mountains and a Chinese temple silhouette against a vibrant red sky. In the center, Panda Po strikes a dynamic kung fu pose, his black and white fur contrasting with the warm tones. He appears mid-leap, with one paw extended in a punch and the other drawn back. Po's expression is determined yet playful. At the bottom, "KUNG FU PANDA" is written in bold, stylized letters with a bamboo pattern underneath, completing the composition.

Kung Fu Panda Poster 2: Tigress
A stylized poster in the same vintage art style and earthy palette. The DreamWorks logo tops the image on its green and black background. The red sky backdrop showcases pagoda rooftops and distant mountains. Tigress takes center stage, her orange fur and black stripes standing out against the background. She's in a fierce martial arts stance, her eyes narrowed in concentration and claws extended. Her tail curves dramatically, adding to the dynamic feel. The "KUNG FU PANDA" title and bamboo pattern footer complete the unified look.

Kung Fu Panda Poster 3: Monkey
Continuing the vintage style and color scheme, this poster features Monkey as the central character. The familiar DreamWorks logo and red sky with Chinese architectural elements frame the scene. Monkey is captured mid-acrobatic move, perhaps swinging from a branch or performing a flip. His agile form and long tail create interesting lines across the composition. His face shows a mischievous grin, embodying his playful nature. The consistent "KUNG FU PANDA" title and bamboo footer maintain the series' cohesion.

Kung Fu Panda Poster 4: Mantis
The final poster in the series maintains the unified elements while spotlighting Mantis. The DreamWorks logo, red sky, and Chinese architectural silhouettes create the familiar backdrop. Despite his small size, Mantis dominates the center of the poster, perhaps shown in close-up or through clever use of perspective. He's captured in an action pose, his forelegs raised in a fighting stance. The poster emphasizes his speed and agility through motion lines or a blurred background. As with the others, the "KUNG FU PANDA" title and bamboo pattern complete the bottom of the design.

Monkey swings energetically from a gnarled tree branch, limbs blurred to suggest rapid motion. Broken bamboo fragments scatter below him, adding playful chaos. His mischievous grin contrasts the serene mountain peaks behind.

Mantis anchors the composition in a low crouch, surrounded by splashing water droplets from an imagined strike. His tiny frame contrasts grand curved temple roofs in the background, with exaggerated shadows emphasizing his martial prowess.

0007_0008.instruction:
Generate a series of 3 Joker posters inspired by Joaquin Phoenix’s portrayal. All posters must share a unified minimalist style, yet each poster emphasizes a distinct focal element.

Unified Elements:

Art Style & Colors: Minimalist design with bold outlines. Use a textured, muted green background with subtle grunge effects.
Header: Include “JOAQUIN PHOENIX” in small white capital letters at the top.
Overall Palette: Utilize distressed yellow, red, blue, and green accents.

Poster 1 – Title Focus:

Emphasis: Display “JOKER” in large, bold, distressed yellow letters dominating the upper half.
Detail: Keep additional elements minimal to let the title stand out.

Poster 2 – Tagline & Date:

Emphasis: Position “OCTOBER 4” on the left and “PUT ON A HAPPY FACE” on the right in small white text.
Detail: Arrange these texts symmetrically, framing the design with subtle supporting elements.

Poster 3 – Character Illustration:

Emphasis: Feature a profile illustration of the Joker’s face with a broad, unsettling smile.
Detail: Highlight his clown makeup (white base, red smile, blue eye triangles), slicked-back dark green hair, and details of his red suit jacket over a green shirt with a yellow vest.
Each poster should maintain the unified style while showcasing a unique focal point.
sub_caption:
Minimalist Joker Poster 1 - Title Focus:
A textured, muted green background with subtle grunge effects. "JOAQUIN PHOENIX" in small white capital letters at the top. The word "JOKER" dominates the upper half in large, bold, distressed yellow letters. Minimal additional elements, allowing the title to stand out. Subtle accents in distressed red, blue, and green throughout.

Minimalist Joker Poster 2 - Tagline & Date Focus:
A textured, muted green background with subtle grunge effects. "JOAQUIN PHOENIX" in small white capital letters at the top. "OCTOBER 4" positioned on the left and "PUT ON A HAPPY FACE" on the right in small white text, symmetrically framing the design. Subtle supporting elements in distressed yellow, red, blue, and green to maintain visual interest without overshadowing the text focus.

Minimalist Joker Poster 3 - Character Illustration Focus:
A textured, muted green background with subtle grunge effects. "JOAQUIN PHOENIX" in small white capital letters at the top. A striking profile illustration of the Joker's face with a broad, unsettling smile dominates the center. The illustration features bold outlines, highlighting his clown makeup with a white base, exaggerated red smile, and blue triangles around the eyes. His slicked-back hair is dark green, and glimpses of a red suit jacket, green shirt, and yellow vest are visible. Distressed color accents complement the overall design.

A poster symmetrically framed by 'OCTOBER 4' on the left and 'PUT ON A HAPPY FACE' on the right in crisp white text. Both phrases are aligned vertically with balanced spacing, flanking a central void filled only with faint grunge textures. Red and blue accents subtly underline the text blocks.

A poster centered on a stylized profile of the Joker’s face with an exaggerated, sharp-edged smile. White base makeup contrasts with vivid red lips and blue triangular eye accents. His dark green hair merges with the background, while a red suit collar and yellow vest peek from below, rendered in flat minimalist shapes.
