0026_0013.instruction: Please provide a plan for a graduation celebration. Generate 4 images showing the decoration and activity areas with detailed text descriptions for each step. For example, <image1> [Begin by hanging graduation banners around the campus.], <image2> [Then, set up a display area for academic caps and certificates.], <image3> [Next, set up a graduation photo area.], <image4> [Finally, review everything to make sure it's ready.].
sub_caption: Begin by hanging graduation banners around the campus. Colorful pennants and streamers in school colors adorn lamp posts and building entrances. A large "Congratulations Graduates!" banner stretches across the main quad, with balloons floating on either side.

Set up a display area for academic caps and certificates. A long table draped in elegant cloth showcases neatly arranged diplomas and graduation caps. Behind it, a backdrop features the school logo and year. Small potted plants add a touch of greenery to the display.

Create a graduation photo area with a decorated archway. The arch is adorned with flowers and twinkle lights, with the school's name and graduation year prominently displayed. Props like oversized diplomas, funny glasses, and speech bubbles are available nearby for fun photo opportunities.

Finally, review everything to ensure it's ready. A checklist is visible as staff members make final adjustments. They're arranging chairs in the ceremony area, testing the sound system, and placing programs on each seat. The stage is set with a podium and rows of chairs for faculty and honored guests.

The banners feature bold school colors and congratulatory messages, with students assisting in hanging them. Streamers and balloons in coordinated hues frame the scene, evoking excitement.

A neatly organized display area with rows of academic caps arranged on a draped table, flanked by framed certificates and small potted plants. A velvet rope subtly separates the exhibit, while sunlight filters through nearby windows, casting soft shadows on the glossy certificates.

An outdoor photo zone with a flower arch backdrop in school colors, surrounded by props like oversized graduation caps and mock diploma scrolls. A photographer adjusts a tripod near a chalkboard sign reading 'Class of 2024', with confetti mid-air adding motion.

A panoramic evening scene showing the fully decorated campus courtyard. A coordinator checks a clipboard while surveying lit string lights above food stalls, aligned chairs for ceremonies, and polished signage. Distant figures test a podium microphone, ensuring readiness.

0026_0014.instruction: Please provide a plan for a Thanksgiving event. Generate 5 images showing the decoration, activity, and food areas with detailed text descriptions for each attraction. For example, <image1> [Start by placing pumpkins and corn at the entrance.], <image2> [Then, place traditional foods and thank-you cards inside.], <image3> [Next, set up a gratitude area.], <image4> [After that, arrange seating for guests.], <image5> [Finally, prepare Thanksgiving-themed refreshments.].
sub_caption: A welcoming entrance adorned with an array of colorful pumpkins, gourds, and dried corn stalks. A rustic wooden sign reads "Happy Thanksgiving" in elegant script. Warm string lights are draped around the doorway, creating a cozy autumn ambiance.

An inviting dining area with a long table covered in a rich, autumn-hued tablecloth. Traditional Thanksgiving dishes are artfully arranged, including a golden roast turkey, cranberry sauce, and various pies. Handwritten thank-you cards serve as place settings, adding a personal touch to each seat.

A cozy gratitude corner featuring a large chalkboard where guests can write what they're thankful for. Comfortable armchairs and throw pillows in warm fall colors surround the area. A basket filled with colored chalk and a "Count Your Blessings" banner complete the heartwarming setup.

An elegantly arranged seating area with multiple round tables dressed in fall-themed linens. Each table is adorned with a centerpiece of mini pumpkins, pinecones, and autumn leaves. Name cards with hand-drawn turkeys guide guests to their seats, while soft candlelight creates a warm atmosphere.

A festive refreshment station offering Thanksgiving-themed drinks and snacks. A large dispenser contains spiced apple cider, surrounded by cinnamon sticks and apple slices for garnish. A tiered stand displays pumpkin spice cookies, maple pecan bars, and other seasonal treats. Rustic wooden signs label each item.

A rustic wooden sign reads 'Give Thanks' in bold lettering, flanked by flickering lanterns casting warm light. Autumn leaves scatter the ground, enhancing the welcoming atmosphere.

A long wooden table indoors showcasing roasted turkey, golden pies, and bread rolls on vintage platters. Handwritten thank-you cards with feather quills lie beside miniature gourds. Amber candlelight glows from wrought-iron holders, reflecting off polished cutlery.

A cozy corner with a large chalkboard labeled 'Gratitude Wall,' surrounded by strings of fairy lights. Colorful paper leaves and pens invite guests to write messages. A woven basket overflows with handwritten notes, framed by branches of red berries and pinecones.

A dining space with mismatched wooden chairs and benches draped in plaid blankets. Tables are set with ivory cloths, bronze napkin rings, and miniature pumpkin centerpieces. Overhead, paper lanterns hang from twine, casting soft shadows on place cards shaped like autumn leaves.

A beverage station featuring apple cider carafes, mugs with cinnamon sticks, and tiered trays of frosted cookies shaped like turkeys. A backdrop of burlap banners reads 'Thankful & Blessed,' accented by dried sunflower bouquets and amber glass jars filled with candied nuts.

0026_0015.instruction: Please provide a plan for a Spring Festival celebration. Generate 6 images showing the decoration, activity, and food areas with detailed text descriptions for each attraction. For example, <image1> [Begin by hanging red decorations and Fu characters at the entrance.], <image2> [Then, place zodiac models and traditional foods inside.], <image3> [Next, set up a Spring Festival prayer area.], <image4> [After that, arrange seating for guests.], <image5> [Then, prepare Spring Festival-themed refreshments.], <image6> [Finally, review everything to make sure it's perfect.].
sub_caption: A vibrant entrance to the Spring Festival celebration. Red lanterns hang from the ceiling, and long strings of red firecrackers drape the doorway. Large golden Fu characters for good fortune are prominently displayed on both sides of the entrance. A pair of traditional lion statues guard the doorway, and red carpets lead the way inside.

The main hall decorated for the Spring Festival. Colorful zodiac animal models are arranged in a circle, representing the Chinese zodiac. Traditional foods are displayed on ornate tables, including a centerpiece of nian gao (New Year's cake), dumplings, and tangerines. Red envelopes are scattered around for good luck.

A serene prayer area for Spring Festival blessings. Incense burners are placed in front of a large golden Buddha statue. Red cushions are arranged for kneeling, and tables hold offerings of fruit and flowers. Calligraphy scrolls with auspicious phrases hang on the walls.

A festive dining area for guests. Round tables are covered with red tablecloths and set with gold-rimmed plates and chopsticks. Each table has a lazy Susan in the center for easy sharing. Paper-cut decorations of the year's zodiac animal adorn the walls, and red lanterns provide warm lighting.

A buffet area with Spring Festival-themed refreshments. A long table is laden with traditional treats like sweet rice balls (tangyuan), spring rolls, and almond cookies. A tea station offers various Chinese teas in decorative pots. Red napkins and gold utensils add a festive touch to the display.

An overview of the entire Spring Festival celebration space. All areas are connected with red and gold decorations, creating a cohesive look. Staff members in traditional Chinese attire make final adjustments, ensuring everything is in perfect order. A large "Happy Spring Festival" banner in Chinese characters spans across the main hall.

0026_0015.Common_Instructions: All images feature vibrant red and gold color schemes, traditional Chinese cultural motifs, and a festive atmosphere, unified by a semi-realistic illustrative style with warm lighting.
Set_Sub_Structure: A grand entrance adorned with red lanterns hanging from arched doorways and golden Fu characters pasted symmetrically on pillars. Workers arrange crimson banners with calligraphy blessings, while paper-cut window decorations cast intricate shadows under sunlight.

Indoor hall filled with illuminated zodiac animal sculptures, centered around the current year's zodiac. Tables display symbolic foods like glutinous rice cakes and dumplings on ornate porcelain, surrounded by miniature pine trees and blooming plum blossoms.

A serene prayer area with a raised altar holding incense burners, ancestral tablets, and offerings of fruits and candied treats. Red silk drapes frame the space, with hanging scrolls depicting auspicious phrases in bold brushstrokes.

Circular banquet tables draped in embroidered red cloths, arranged around a central performance stage. Each seat has a golden napkin fold and small gift boxes, while overhead, ribbon streamers cascade from ceiling fixtures.

A refreshment station featuring tiered trays of nian gao rice cakes, golden fried spring rolls, and sugar-coated haws on skewers. Tea sets with dragon motifs steam beside red envelope displays, all under soft lantern glow.

An overview of the fully prepared venue showing harmonious integration of decor elements. Final checks ensure symmetrical arrangement of lights, spotless table settings, and unobstructed pathways between activity zones.

0026_0016.instruction: Please provide a plan for a Dragon Boat Festival celebration. Generate 5 images showing the decoration, activity, and food areas with detailed text descriptions for each attraction. For example, <image1> [Start by placing zongzi models and mugwort at the entrance.], <image2> [Then, place dragon boat models and traditional foods inside.], <image3> [Next, set up a Dragon Boat Festival experience area.], <image4> [After that, arrange seating for guests.], <image5> [Finally, prepare Dragon Boat Festival-themed refreshments.].
sub_caption: A welcoming entrance to the Dragon Boat Festival celebration. Large bamboo poles frame the gateway, adorned with colorful ribbons. On either side, tables display artfully arranged zongzi (rice dumplings) of various flavors. Bundles of fresh mugwort and calamus hang above, filling the air with a fragrant aroma. A traditional Chinese lantern with "端午节" (Dragon Boat Festival) written on it hangs in the center.

The main celebration area, featuring a life-sized dragon boat model as the centerpiece. Around it, stalls showcase traditional foods like realgar wine, five-color dumplings, and xionghuang cake. Informational placards explain the significance of each item. Strings of red lanterns crisscross overhead, creating a festive atmosphere. Children gather around a table learning to wrap zongzi under the guidance of an elderly volunteer.

An interactive Dragon Boat Festival experience zone. A mini water pool holds scaled-down dragon boats where visitors can practice paddling techniques. Nearby, a craft area allows guests to make their own sachets filled with fragrant herbs. A face-painting station offers designs of dragons and other festival symbols. In one corner, a storyteller captivates an audience with tales of Qu Yuan and the origins of the festival.

A spacious seating area for guests to relax and enjoy the festivities. Long tables covered in red cloths are arranged in rows, each decorated with centerpieces of lotus flowers and miniature dragon boats. Traditional folding fans serve as place settings. A stage at the front is set up for cultural performances, with a backdrop depicting a serene river scene. To one side, a tea ceremony area offers a quiet space for reflection.

A vibrant refreshment zone featuring Dragon Boat Festival-themed treats. A central counter offers chilled realgar wine and sweet rice wines in decorative cups. Food stalls serve modern twists on traditional fare, such as zongzi-flavored ice cream and dragon boat-shaped pastries. A dessert table displays an array of colorful mochi and fruit-based sweets. Hanging baskets filled with aromatic herbs add to the sensory experience, while staff members in traditional attire serve guests.

A central display featuring intricately carved dragon boat models on a flowing blue fabric river. Surrounding tables showcase traditional foods: pyramid-shaped zongzi, salted duck eggs, and bowls of yellow rice wine, arranged on lacquered trays with leaf motifs.

An interactive zone with a miniature dragon boat drum setup, bamboo crafting stations for making mugwort sachets, and calligraphy boards for writing festival blessings. Participants wear colorful silk ribbons as they engage in activities.

A seating area with long wooden benches draped in indigo cloth, accented by ceramic pots holding fresh mugwort sprigs. Tables are set with red tableware and centerpieces of folded reed dragons, inviting guests to gather and celebrate.

A refreshment corner offering themed snacks: zongzi-shaped pastries, herbal teas infused with mugwort, and rice dumplings on lotus-leaf platters. Decorative banners with dragon patterns frame the display, enhancing the festive mood.

Colorful paper lanterns in red, orange, and yellow line the pathway. Traditional Chinese decorations and banners with festival greetings adorn the sides. Guests are seen entering, admiring the festive atmosphere.

A serene moon-watching area set up in an open space. Comfortable seating arrangements with low tables and cushions are placed on a grassy area. String lights are hung overhead to create a magical ambiance. A large screen or projection area is visible for sharing moon folklore and stories. People are gathered, looking up at the night sky.

A beautifully arranged food station featuring an assortment of mooncakes and tea. Various flavors of mooncakes are displayed on tiered platters, decorated with flower petals and leaves. A traditional tea set is prominently placed, with different types of teas available. Staff members in traditional attire are seen serving guests and explaining the significance of the treats.

Volunteers arrange floral arrangements with osmanthus branches to enhance the welcoming ambiance.

A tranquil outdoor moon-watching zone featuring low wooden platforms with cushioned seating. Paper lanterns dangle from tree branches, framing a clear view of the night sky. A decorative telescope stands nearby, surrounded by small tables holding illustrated star maps and tea candles for ambiance.

0026_0018.instruction: Please provide a plan for a Tree Planting Day event. Generate 5 images showing the decoration, activity, and food areas with detailed text descriptions for each attraction. For example, <image1> [Start by placing green decorations and seedlings at the entrance.], <image2> [Then, set up a tree-planting experience area.], <image3> [Next, prepare environmental protection displays.], <image4> [After that, arrange seating for guests.], <image5> [Finally, prepare Tree Planting Day-themed refreshments.].
sub_caption: Entrance Decoration: A welcoming arch made of intertwined branches and vines, adorned with colorful leaves and small potted plants. Green banners with "Tree Planting Day" hang from the arch. Rows of various seedlings in biodegradable pots line the pathway, creating an inviting green corridor for guests to walk through.

Tree-Planting Experience Area: A spacious outdoor section with marked planting spots and stacks of young trees ready for planting. Volunteers in green t-shirts assist participants. Educational signs explain proper planting techniques and tree care. A variety of shovels, watering cans, and gardening gloves are neatly organized on tables for easy access.

Environmental Protection Displays: Interactive booths showcasing different aspects of environmental conservation. One display features a miniature ecosystem in a glass terrarium. Another has a "Guess the Tree Species" game with leaf samples. A recycling station demonstrates proper waste sorting, while a solar panel exhibit shows renewable energy in action.

Guest Seating Area: A shaded zone with eco-friendly seating options. Benches made from reclaimed wood, large tree stumps serving as natural chairs, and picnic blankets spread on grassy areas. Potted plants and small trees create a garden-like atmosphere. A central stage area is set up for speakers and presentations.

Refreshment Station: A rustic wooden counter offering Tree Planting Day-themed snacks and drinks. Green smoothies in reusable cups, tree-shaped cookies, and fruit skewers resembling miniature trees. A large dispenser filled with infused water decorated with floating lemon slices and mint leaves. Compostable plates and utensils are neatly stacked nearby.
0026_0018.Identity_Instructions: depicting a Tree Planting Day event with cohesive environmental themes and community engagement.
0026_0018.Common_Instructions: All images maintain a vibrant, educational aesthetic with greenery, eco-friendly elements, and consistent use of earthy tones to emphasize environmental stewardship.
Set_Sub_Structure: A welcoming entrance adorned with lush potted plants, banners reading 'Celebrate Tree Planting Day', and rows of seedlings arranged neatly on wooden stands. Sunlight filters through leafy arches, casting playful shadows on the path, while volunteers guide attendees with smiling gestures.

An interactive tree-planting zone with shovels, watering cans, and soil bags organized around demonstration plots. Children and adults kneel to plant saplings, guided by instructional signboards showing root placement. A mural of growing trees spans the backdrop, symbolizing growth and care.

Educational displays featuring infographic panels on deforestation and climate solutions. A sculptural globe surrounded by miniature trees dominates the center, while touchscreens cycle through conservation videos. Recycled art installations flank the space, crafted from plastic bottles and reclaimed wood.

A shaded seating area with circular wooden benches under fabric canopies printed with leaf patterns. Foldable tables hold seed-paper crafting kits, and a small stage hosts a speaker discussing sustainability. Attendees chat while surrounded by hanging planters with trailing ivy.

A refreshment station offering tree-shaped cookies, herb-infused drinks in biodegradable cups, and fruit skewers arranged like saplings. Burlap tablecloths feature embroidered tree motifs, and chalkboard menus list eco-friendly ingredients. A banner above reads 'Nourish Nature' in leafy lettering.

Burlap tablecloths feature embroidered tree motifs, and chalkboard menus list eco-friendly ingredients. A banner above reads 'Nourish Nature' in leafy lettering.

0026_0019.instruction: Please provide a plan for an International Labor Day event. Generate 6 images showing the decoration, activity, and food areas with detailed text descriptions for each attraction. For example, <image1> [Begin by displaying labor tools and hanging red banners at the entrance.], <image2> [Then, set up a labor experience area.], <image3> [Next, display labor model achievements.], <image4> [After that, arrange seating for guests.], <image5> [Then, prepare Labor Day-themed refreshments.], <image6> [Finally, review everything to make sure it's perfect.].
sub_caption: A grand entrance archway decorated with various labor tools like hammers, wrenches, and hard hats. Large red banners with "Happy International Labor Day" hang from the arch. Workers in different uniforms are welcoming guests, creating a festive atmosphere.

An interactive labor experience area with multiple stations. One station has a miniature construction site where visitors can operate small excavators. Another has a factory assembly line simulation. There's also a virtual reality booth showcasing different professions.

A gallery-style space showcasing achievements of labor models. Large portraits of workers hang on the walls, accompanied by plaques detailing their contributions. In the center, there's a rotating display of innovative tools and inventions created by workers.

A spacious seating area with rows of chairs facing a stage. The chairs are arranged in sections representing different industries, with small flags or symbols on each section. A large screen behind the stage displays labor-related statistics and inspirational quotes.

A food court area with stalls offering Labor Day-themed refreshments. One stall serves "Wrench Wraps" (sandwiches), another offers "Hard Hat Sundaes" (ice cream), and there's a "Toolbox Buffet" with various finger foods arranged in a large toolbox-shaped container.

An overhead view of the entire event space, showing all areas connected by decorated pathways. Event staff are making final adjustments, checking sound systems, and ensuring safety measures are in place. A information booth near the entrance provides event maps and schedules.
0026_0019.Identity_Instructions: documenting the preparation stages of an International Labor Day event celebration.

A hands-on workshop area with wooden workbenches holding miniature construction kits and tool replicas. Interactive screens show instructional videos, while participants wearing aprons assemble models under hanging string lights shaped like bolts and screws.

A gallery wall featuring framed photos of workers in diverse professions, accompanied by timelines and glass cases displaying medals. Illuminated panels with quotes about perseverance stand between rotating pedestals showcasing historical labor artifacts.

Rows of neatly arranged chairs draped with red cloth covers, each seat holding a small gift box tied with ribbon. A central aisle leads to a stage backdrop of a giant gear mosaic, flanked by potted plants and folded flags ready for placement.

A buffet table with tiered trays of bread-shaped cookies, cupcakes decorated with edible tool motifs, and pitchers of lemonade in metal mugs. Centerpieces feature miniature scarecrows holding 'Happy Labor Day' signs, surrounded by wheat sheaves and red napkins.

A coordinator in a red vest surveys the fully prepared venue, clipboard in hand. The foreground shows a polished floor reflecting hanging banner ends, while background elements combine tools, draped flags, and food displays to unify all event aspects.

0026_0020.instruction: Please provide a plan for a Technology Festival celebration. Generate 5 images showing the decoration, activity, and exhibition areas with detailed text descriptions for each attraction. For example, <image1> [Start by setting up interactive tech exhibits and demo zones.], <image2> [Then, arrange seating for guest speakers and presentation areas.], <image3> [Next, create hands-on workshop areas for various tech activities.], <image4> [After that, set up a networking lounge with refreshments.], <image5> [Finally, prepare lighting and sound systems for evening events.].
sub_caption: A vibrant exhibition hall filled with interactive tech exhibits and demo zones. Sleek touchscreen displays showcase the latest gadgets, while VR headsets allow visitors to experience cutting-edge virtual worlds. Robotic arms demonstrate precision manufacturing, and a central holographic display projects 3D images of futuristic cityscapes.

An auditorium-style seating area facing a large stage with multiple presentation screens. Comfortable chairs are arranged in a semi-circle, each equipped with a small digital tablet for note-taking. The stage features a podium with built-in holographic projectors for speakers to showcase their innovations. Side areas include translation booths for international attendees.

A spacious workshop area divided into different tech-focused zones. One section has 3D printers and design stations for rapid prototyping. Another area features coding stations with multiple monitors for software development workshops. A robotics corner includes kits and tools for building and programming small robots. A green screen area allows for augmented reality experiments.

A modern networking lounge with a mix of high-top tables and comfortable seating areas. A central bar serves tech-themed mocktails and healthy snacks. Interactive touch tables allow attendees to exchange contact information digitally. Charging stations are integrated into furniture, and a large digital wall displays real-time social media feeds and event updates.

An outdoor evening event space with a main stage surrounded by high-tech lighting rigs. Large LED screens flank the stage, displaying dynamic visuals. A sophisticated sound system with directional speakers ensures clear audio throughout the area. Illuminated pathways guide attendees, while projection mapping on nearby buildings creates an immersive tech-inspired atmosphere.

A tiered presentation arena with curved LED walls projecting data visualizations. Modular seating surrounds a circular stage equipped with augmented reality projectors, where a speaker gestures toward holographic slides.

Workshop stations with collaborative tech setups: robotic arm assembly tables, coding terminals with live code projections, and 3D printing zones. Participants wear AR headsets while manipulating virtual circuit boards.

A minimalist networking lounge with geometric LED-lit furniture and transparent digital menu boards. A central refreshment bar serves glowing beverages under floating drone displays showing attendee profiles.

An outdoor event space transformed by programmable LED floor tiles and synchronized laser grids. Towering speaker arrays frame a stage where prismatic light beams intersect with fog effects for immersive performances.

0026_0021.instruction: Please provide a plan for a music festival celebration. Generate 6 images showing the decoration, stage setup, and activity areas with detailed text descriptions for each attraction. For example, <image1> [Start by setting up the main stage with sound and lighting systems.], <image2> [Then, create smaller performance stages for various music genres.], <image3> [Next, set up food and beverage areas with festival-themed offerings.], <image4> [After that, arrange seating and relaxation areas for attendees.], <image5> [Then, prepare merchandise booths and art installations.], <image6> [Finally, review all areas to ensure safety and readiness for performances.].
sub_caption: A massive main stage dominates the festival grounds, featuring towering speaker stacks, dazzling LED screens, and an intricate lighting rig. Technicians are busy testing equipment while stagehands make final adjustments to the backdrop. The stage is set against a backdrop of trees, creating an amphitheater-like atmosphere.

Three smaller stages are scattered across the festival area, each with its own unique design. One has a rustic, wooden structure for folk and acoustic acts, another features neon lights for electronic music, and the third has a urban graffiti aesthetic for hip-hop performances. Musicians are doing sound checks on each stage.

A bustling food court area filled with colorful food trucks and stalls. Vendors are preparing a variety of cuisines, from gourmet burgers to vegan options. A central bar area is stocked with craft beers and cocktail ingredients. Strings of lights are being hung overhead to create a festive atmosphere as night falls.

Multiple seating zones are set up throughout the grounds. There's a grassy hill with picnic blankets, a area with comfortable bean bags under shade sails, and several clusters of tables and chairs. Near the relaxation areas, charging stations for phones and a few quiet tents for those needing a break from the noise are being set up.

A vibrant marketplace area features rows of tents selling band merchandise, local artisan crafts, and festival souvenirs. Nearby, large-scale art installations are being assembled, including a giant guitar sculpture and an interactive light display. Artists are putting finishing touches on murals that will serve as popular photo spots.

Security personnel are conducting a final walkthrough of the festival grounds, checking entry points and setting up bag check stations. Medical tents are being stocked with supplies, and information booths are being prepared with maps and schedules. Staff members are testing the festival app to ensure all attendees can access real-time updates and navigation assistance.
0026_0021.Identity_Instructions: vibrant music festival celebration with coordinated event areas.
0026_0021.Common_Instructions: All images share a lively, colorful festival atmosphere with cohesive design elements like string lights, bold signage, and crowds of attendees. The style balances realism with dynamic energy to emphasize preparation and festive excitement.
Set_Sub_Structure: A grand main stage dominates the scene, flanked by towering speaker stacks and a ceiling of laser lights. A massive LED screen displays abstract visuals, while crew members test equipment. The stage's metallic framework contrasts with glowing neon accents, suggesting a fusion of technology and artistry.

Secondary circular stages feature genre-specific decor: one with neon graffiti for electronic music, another draped in rustic banners for folk performances. Each has unique lighting—strobe effects for the former, warm lanterns for the latter—with musicians soundchecking instruments.

Rows of food trucks and pop-up stalls offer global cuisine, decorated with hanging paper lanterns and chalkboard menus. Staff arrange rainbow-colored drink dispensers and festival-themed snacks. Patrons mingle near picnic tables adorned with floral centerpieces.

Scattered lounge zones include hammocks strung between trees, bean bag clusters, and shaded pergolas with fairy lights. Volunteers place recycling bins and directional signage while attendees relax on patterned cushions, enjoying the ambient pre-festival buzz.

Merchandise tents showcase band T-shirts and glow accessories under striped canopies. Nearby, an interactive light sculpture reacts to touch, and muralists paint a collaborative festival-themed artwork on a large canvas, surrounded by watching crowds.

Safety crews inspect stages, checking fire extinguishers and barrier stability. Medical tents with red cross flags stand ready near clearly marked exits. Final touches include placing anti-slip mats on damp grass and testing emergency lighting systems.

0026_0022.instruction: Please provide a plan for an art exhibition. Generate 5 images showing the setup process and key areas with detailed text descriptions for each step. For example, <image1> [Begin by preparing the gallery space with appropriate lighting and climate control.], <image2> [Then, arrange artwork displays with proper spacing and labeling.], <image3> [Next, set up interactive art experiences and demonstration areas.], <image4> [After that, prepare educational materials and guided tour routes.], <image5> [Finally, review all installations to ensure they meet exhibition standards.].
sub_caption: A spacious, white-walled gallery with technicians adjusting track lighting and installing climate control sensors. Large windows are covered with UV-filtering shades. The room is empty, awaiting artwork, with tape markings on the floor indicating future display locations.

Artists and curators carefully hanging paintings and positioning sculptures throughout the gallery. Wall labels are being applied next to each piece. A staff member uses a laser measure to ensure precise spacing between artworks. Protective barriers are placed near delicate installations.

A corner of the gallery transformed into an interactive digital art station with touch screens and VR headsets. Nearby, an artist sets up an easel for live painting demonstrations. Comfortable seating areas are arranged for visitors to engage with multimedia presentations.

Gallery staff organizing informational brochures and audio guide devices at the entrance. A large touchscreen display shows an interactive map of the exhibition. Docents review guided tour scripts while walking through the space, practicing their presentations.

The gallery director and lead curator doing a final walkthrough, clipboard in hand. They inspect lighting, check security measures, and ensure all artworks are properly secured. Staff members make last-minute adjustments to signage and test interactive elements one last time before opening.
0026_0022.Identity_Instructions: documenting the systematic preparation of an art exhibition space.
0026_0022.Common_Instructions: All images maintain a professional, organized aesthetic with clean lines and neutral tones, emphasizing meticulous attention to setup logistics. Shared elements include modern gallery architecture, subtle branding accents, and coordinated teams of staff executing tasks.
Set_Sub_Structure: A spacious gallery interior with high ceilings, where technicians adjust track lighting angles and monitor wall-mounted climate control panels. Sunlight filters through large windows, blending with artificial lights to create balanced illumination. Ladders and toolboxes sit near freshly painted white walls.

Curators in professional attire position sculptural plinths and framed artworks at calculated intervals. Digital labels with QR codes are mounted beside each piece, while a floor plan clipboard guides placement. Empty wall sections contrast with installed works to highlight spatial rhythm.

Interactive stations emerge in a designated zone: VR headsets hang neatly beside digital art projections, while a live demonstration area features an artist's workstation with paints and clay. Clear signage explains participation rules, with charging cables and tablets arranged on minimalist tables.

A visitor services desk displays glossy exhibition catalogs and multilingual brochures. Color-coded floor markers trace guided tour paths, while wall-mounted timelines and artist biographies line transitional spaces. A staff member practices speaking into an audio guide headset nearby.

A quality assurance team conducts final checks using clipboards and measurement tools. They inspect lighting consistency on a large canvas, test touchscreen responsiveness at interactive stations, and verify emergency exit visibility. Clean floors and polished surfaces reflect readiness for opening.

For example, <image1> [Start by assigning vendor booths with clear numbering and category grouping.], <image2> [Then, set up demonstration areas for live craft-making.], <image3> [Next, prepare workshop spaces for hands-on craft experiences.], <image4> [After that, arrange food and beverage areas that complement the craft theme.], <image5> [Then, create central display areas for featured artisans.], <image6> [Finally, review all areas to ensure they showcase craftsmanship and creativity.].
sub_caption: A bird's-eye view of an empty fairground with chalk outlines marking vendor booth spaces. Numbered squares are arranged in neat rows, with larger sections grouped by craft categories like "Pottery," "Textiles," and "Woodworking." A person with a clipboard is seen walking between the marked areas, finalizing the layout.

A partially set-up demonstration area with several workstations. One station shows a potter's wheel with clay and tools nearby, another has a loom with colorful threads, and a third features woodworking equipment. Signage above each area indicates the type of craft being demonstrated. A few craftspeople are setting up their materials and equipment.

A spacious indoor area divided into several workshop spaces. Each space has tables and chairs arranged in a semicircle facing a main demonstration table. Craft supplies like paints, brushes, fabric, and beads are neatly organized on shelves along the walls. A schedule board lists various workshops throughout the day.

A charming food court area with rustic wooden stalls and string lights overhead. Food vendors are setting up, offering artisanal breads, locally-sourced produce, and handcrafted beverages. Picnic tables with colorful handmade tablecloths are scattered around, and a central area features a large sculpture made from recycled materials.

A grand central pavilion with high ceilings and natural light. Inside, pedestals and display cases showcase exceptional craft pieces from featured artisans. Spotlights illuminate intricate jewelry, elaborate quilts, and stunning glasswork. Informational placards beside each piece provide details about the artist and their techniques.

An overview of the entire craft fair just before opening. Colorful banners and signs guide visitors to different areas. Volunteers in matching t-shirts are doing final checks on booths and displays. The fair is a vibrant mix of vendor stalls, demonstration areas, workshops, and central displays, all ready to showcase the best of local craftsmanship.

A workshop space with long tables covered in craft supplies like paints, yarn, and tools. Chairs are neatly arranged, and a chalkboard lists activity schedules. An instructor prepares materials at the front, surrounded by sample projects.

0026_0024.instruction: Please provide a plan for an academic conference. Generate 6 images showing the setup process and key areas with detailed text descriptions for each step. For example, <image1> [Start by preparing presentation rooms with appropriate audiovisual equipment.], <image2> [Then, set up registration desks and information booths.], <image3> [Next, arrange poster presentation areas with adequate lighting and display space.], <image4> [After that, prepare dining areas with networking opportunities.], <image5> [Then, set up exhibit halls for academic publishers and professional organizations.], <image6> [Finally, review all arrangements to ensure they meet academic and professional standards.].
sub_caption: A spacious presentation room with rows of chairs facing a large projector screen. At the front, there's a podium with a microphone and laptop. Along the sides, you can see speakers mounted on the walls and a control panel for audiovisual equipment. Natural light streams in through partially covered windows, creating an ideal environment for presentations.

A welcoming registration area with multiple desks staffed by friendly personnel. Each desk has a computer, name tag printer, and conference materials. Nearby, colorful information booths display maps, schedules, and local attractions. A large banner with the conference logo hangs prominently above, and potted plants add a touch of greenery to the space.

A well-lit open area with rows of poster boards arranged in a grid pattern. Each board has a spotlight above it and ample space for researchers to stand and discuss their work. Small tables with water pitchers and glasses are placed strategically throughout. The floor is carpeted to reduce noise, and directional signs help attendees navigate the poster sessions.

A bright dining hall with round tables adorned with simple centerpieces. A buffet line along one wall offers a variety of food options. High-top tables are scattered around for those who prefer to stand and mingle. In one corner, there's a coffee and refreshment station. The room's layout encourages movement and interaction, with plenty of space between tables for networking conversations.

A bustling exhibit hall with booths from various academic publishers and professional organizations. Each booth has eye-catching displays of books, journals, and promotional materials. Some booths feature interactive touchscreens or small presentation areas. Wide aisles allow for easy movement, and comfortable seating areas are interspersed throughout for impromptu meetings or rest.

A conference organizer with a clipboard standing in the main lobby, surveying the completed setup. Around them, you can see glimpses of the presentation rooms, registration area, poster session space, dining hall, and exhibit area. Staff members are making final adjustments, ensuring signage is correct, testing equipment, and arranging welcome packets. The atmosphere is one of anticipation and professionalism as the conference prepares to welcome attendees.

A brightly lit hall with parallel rows of poster display boards. Each board has numbered headers and adjustable spotlights. Researchers arrange poster materials on tables while attendees engage in discussions in designated conversational zones.

sub_caption: A welcoming entrance arch decorated with colorful balloons and banners. A large, eye-catching sign displays the charity's name and mission statement. Volunteers in matching t-shirts greet attendees with warm smiles and informational pamphlets.

A row of neatly arranged information booths with vibrant displays and interactive touchscreens. Each booth represents a different aspect of the charity's work. Nearby, a volunteer station is set up with a registration desk and a schedule board showing various activities throughout the event.

An elegant auction area with glass display cases showcasing valuable items and experiences up for bid. Silent auction tables are arranged with bid sheets and pens. A stage is set up for the live auction, complete with a podium and large screens to display items.

A spacious seating area with rows of chairs facing a main stage. The stage is equipped with a podium, microphones, and large screens for presentations. Banners with inspiring quotes and charity success stories hang on either side of the stage.

Multiple donation stations set up with tablets for digital payments, cash boxes for physical donations, and card readers for credit card transactions. Each station is staffed by a volunteer ready to assist. Informational posters nearby explain how donations will be used to support the charity's cause.

An overview of the entire event space, showcasing how all areas flow together cohesively. Decorations, signage, and color schemes consistently reflect the charity's branding and values. Volunteers and staff members are positioned throughout, ensuring a smooth and engaging experience for all attendees.
0026_0025.Identity_Instructions: illustrating key sections of a charity event setup aligned with the organization's mission and values.
0026_0025.Common_Instructions: All images share a cohesive theme of community engagement and compassion, featuring consistent branding elements like the charity’s logo, color scheme, and uplifting visual motifs to unify the event’s purpose.
Set_Sub_Structure: A welcoming entrance with a large arched banner displaying the charity’s name and mission statement. Colorful floral arrangements frame the pathway, and volunteers greet attendees with brochures. The design emphasizes openness and inclusivity through warm lighting and accessible signage.

Information booths with interactive digital screens showcasing the charity’s impact stories. Volunteers in branded attire stand behind tables stocked with pamphlets and donation forms. The layout encourages engagement, with clear directional arrows guiding visitors to adjacent areas.

An auction area featuring neatly arranged tables displaying donated items like artwork and gift baskets. Each item has a description card and a bid sheet, with soft spotlighting to highlight key pieces. A backdrop with the charity’s slogan ties the space to the event’s purpose.

A presentation area with rows of chairs facing a raised stage adorned with the charity’s logo. A podium and large screen for speeches or videos anchor the space. Overhead string lights create a welcoming ambiance while maintaining professionalism.

Donation stations equipped with tablets for digital payments, cash collection boxes, and contactless card readers. Staff in matching uniforms assist donors, while wall-mounted infographics explain how contributions will be used. The setup balances efficiency and transparency.

An overview of the entire event space, capturing coordinators conducting final checks. Decorations, signage, and activity zones are harmoniously arranged to reflect unity. Subtle details like branded tablecloths and mission-focused wall decals reinforce the charity’s identity.
